To The

Salsa Journal

I write somedays. Somedays, I code too. Otherwise I'm a messy person who is just entangled in between AUX cables, headsets, some random food stuffs around and laptop screens. My day goes by staring at the not-so-good-looking screen, my nights often have a share of the sky outside my window. Here I am, to share my part of the story which may carry a glimpse of the chaos going on in my head.

Latest article:

For the time being, I'm a circumstantial undergraduate engineering student. I read. I keep reading stuffs. Sharing here some random thoughts on John Green's 'The fault in our Stars'. Give it a try...
